bio:treatment.description: Spikes 3-8 cm long, 15-20 mm wide. Glumes sometimes absent. Lemma hairs 1.5-2.5 mm. 2n = 56.
bio:treatment.discussion: Leymus innovatus subsp. velutinus is the more northern of the two subspecies, growing in Alaska, the Yukon Territory, and the western Northwest Territories.
